alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 02 at 3:24PM HST until March 03 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR BIG ISLAND SUMMITS TONIGHT AND THURSDAY... .West winds will increase through the night as an upper level trough approaches the Big Island. Winds will peak Thursday morning and decline in the afternoon, likely falling below Wind Advisory levels during the evening. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM HST THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds increasing to 35 to 50 mph tonight and peaking Thursday morning. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking difficult. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Consider postponing travel to the summits until conditions improve. If you must travel to the summits, use extra caution walking and driving. Be careful opening or closing doors.
